item.description: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) is a role within an organization that is responsible for ensuring the reliability, performance, and uptime of the company’s systems and applications. SREs work closely with development teams to design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable systems, and use a combination of software engineering and operations skills to improve the reliability and performance of the company’s systems.
